tweets.text: @mathisonian oh you mean my favorite notebook? https://t.co/770iJ6j6tV
god forbid you wanna do state management of your states and then you have the state of your states in your state and  oh god

the fun thing about election maps is that there are like 3 things you can call a thing at any time, is that New York? Or is it NY? Or is it FIPS 36? Is the winner a D? A Dem? A Democrat? The answer is all of the above, sir, put it in the code.

you couldn't design a worse user experience than a community designed by a finance bro- not based on a unique vision, not based on a product a group of people find useful, but so that each participant can serve to be squeezed for their money
wake up, new morning, and what it this, its the NFT people I followed out of curiosity putting the worst possible imaginable garbage onto my feed https://t.co/qbRm9WHjue

most of these are dated 2013/2014, but I am pretty sure that's when I made this backup hard drive, so a lot of these gif are close to 10 years old - are vintage gifs a thing yet? https://t.co/v5nYifAU5r
who knows what life they will take on next https://t.co/4e3Q3a5vvH
I claim no ownership over any of these, and owe a lot of my visual / artistic progression to the way they inspired me - but it seems silly to keep them trapped on a hard drive https://t.co/eKAo0aGduu
so now, on an old hard drive, I have hundreds of weird gifs (these are just the ones I cared enough to tag and organize) https://t.co/0ZwRfHk3Y8

when I used to DJ I would project these with effects on them, and cut between the gifs in time to the beat, which is surprisingly effective if your source material is cool enough https://t.co/4TWVwYWMbh
most of my favorites in this collection are relatively simple looping animations of geometric shapes https://t.co/fzUdCmefHs

i wish i had been better about sourcing, but a lot of these floating along without credits anyway, not many clues as to where they come from, a lot of it was student or in-progress work that I am sure have been lost to time https://t.co/aOApqBz0SN

In an old hard drive I found my collection of 182 hand-curated art gifs from dribbble and tumblr, so I put them on S3 and now there's a little notebook that makes them easy to explore https://t.co/a2oLXPSbnh
@lynncyrin @claimeuh Godspeed

@visakanv In joyful moments, my instinct is to live in them fully (not take photos or record in some way) â€“ and then I find in the quieter moments I am anxious or sad and that is when I end up posting
